alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 8:11AM CDT until May 06 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Polecat Creek near Sapulpa affecting Creek County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Polecat Creek near Sapulpa. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, moderate flooding affects pasturelands and oil fields between Sapulpa and the Tulsa County line. Barns and other outbuildings experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:47 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
